SIDE EFFECTS FOR ALDACTAZIDE: Dr. had me on Lisinopril (30 mg per day) for years and it did very little to lower my BP. When used in combo with Aldactazide, it was like flipping a switch.

REASON: None observed.  No apparent increase in urination.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR ALDACTAZIDE: Works best as an additional med for hypertension but for me, not alone,

REASON: Not only the only effective drug, but also minimun side effects!

RATING: I could write a book on the Doctors I've gone through and the combinations of drugs I have taken to solve my blood pressure problem. Try aldactazide, you'll like it! And cheap too.
